testimonials.message: You can't make a mistake. Anything that happens you can learn to use - and make something beautiful out of it.
testimonials.name: Sam W.

testimonials.message: Everybody's different. Trees are different. Let them all be individuals.
testimonials.name: John W.

testimonials.message: Don't hurry. Take your time and enjoy. Let's have a little bit of fun today. You need to have a very firm paint to do this.
testimonials.name: Dean W.
